bibl.title: Maresha in the Reign of Ptolemy II Philadelphus.
Ptolemy II Philadelphus and his World
bibl.author: KLONER, Amos

bibl.note: The economic numismatic evidence. - The evidence from the necropolis of Maresha. - The evidence from Khirbet Za'aquqa.
bibl.seg: KLONER Amos, Maresha in the Reign of Ptolemy II Philadelphus.
Paul McKECHNIE and Philippe GUILLAUME (Edd.), Ptolemy II Philadelphus and his World = Mnemosyne. Supplementum 300 (Leiden, 2008) pp. 171-181.
